---
category: news
title: "John Deere Puts Ag Tech Center Stage at CES 24"
excerpt: "John Deere has maintained a notable presence at CES since 2019. This year it dubbed its massive CES exhibit “Dirt to Shirt,” presenting a full technology-enabled cotton production cycle. The main highlight was a fully autonomous 8R tractor that attendees controlled themselves with an iPhone. All from 1,300 miles away, over exhibit hall Wi-Fi."
